insurance_fields.accident_summary: A blue sedan (Vehicle A) traveling at moderate speed failed to slow down for stationary traffic at a signalized intersection and collided with the rear of a white SUV (Vehicle B).
insurance_fields.liability_indicator: Vehicle A is determined to be 100% at fault for the collision due to a clear failure to maintain a safe following distance and inattentive driving.
vehicle_damages: Severe front-end damage to Vehicle A (sedan)
Moderate rear-end damage to Vehicle B (SUV)
